WTACTION.name: UploadHeader
WTACTION.WTCUSTOM: Set oFileSys = server.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") oFileSys.DeleteFile reqSysWebDirectory + "Images\Company\" + CStr(reqCompanyID) + "\header[en].*" Set oFileSys = Nothing

WTACTION.name: New
